locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ There is a small drivers lounge and laundry section on the way to the showers. ‚Ä¶

The service is nice, the store is not that big but it work. The shower you can find them at the left side. You can find the food stand with most of the stuff. Also there is pizza and a small buffet to get chicken or something else. Parking ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ while. No greetings when customers enters the store, ignored me as I stood there wanting to ask a question and the restroom and shower sinks had white looking water running out of them so I definitely didn‚Äôt brush my teeth. I only ‚Ä¶

I took a shower here and as soon as I turned on the water for the shower the water smelled of strong chemicals. Then as the water ran over my body my face and private area began to tingle and get a burning sensation. Then as the water ‚Ä¶
Staff was really friendly and professional.  The facility was clean, organized, and well stocked.  The bathroom and shower were very clean. Thank you for an awesome stay!

Stopped at this flying J early morning on 09/16/2022 at 3:00am to take shower. Cashier said all 9 showers need to be clean. Waited  there for 30 minutes but nobody showed up to clean shower. Don‚Äôt want to leave negative comments but this ‚Ä¶

Why is it that the shower cleaner is outside with the person filling the fuel tanks?  When there are six people waiting in line for a shower and only 9 showers at this location??  Waste of my time and others!  Especially when there are four ‚Ä¶

I wasn't to happy with this place. Shower #14 ran hot and cold, mostly hot, which is a trend at Pilot/Flying J's nationwide lately. They kept their hot food too long before they brought up fresh food.

Avoid. Shower temperature is all over the place as you go through the cycle of setting it, then if any toilet in the building is flushed, it loses all cold water. Cycle repeats and repeats so you spend more time out of the shower rather ‚Ä¶

Took 10hr break here 5/21/22 @ 1015pm holy cow needed a shower since my Beagle had cloths pin on his nose and boy there showers are amazingly clean, cleanest I have seen in some time, no mold, no dirty corners there maintenance crew dose ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Fuel price OK and yes you get a free lunch,drink and a shower But need to fuel 100 gallons really!! And Bathrooms are SUPER DIRTY I can believe there are three women attending this  place I won't even eat their food
Not what I expected from outside. Good fuel price , fairly clean shower . Good chicken & rice lunch . Mr Sam is great cook.

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Best showers ever! Used Shower #1

Urine and pubic hair on the toilet and no soap in the shower. Im too broke to have more than shampoo. Dont be like Pilot. One time, I was here, and the shop took 8 hours to try to upsell my company a tire they didnt want before the next ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the shop worker who helped me the last two days.stuck here with ABS issues for 30 hours he found all the problems and even got me a shower amazing staff 9/27 and 9/24 thank you for your kindness and it was grateful being able to talk to you

I stopped her in the middle of the day to rest and take a shower.  Used my app and it didn't properly connect to the store. I was assigned a shower that had not be cleaned yet. I went to the fuel desk and Antonio Pierce jumped right on it. ‚Ä¶

This place is disgusting. Most disgusting love's I have ever been to. Waited for an hour for a shower. When I walked it, it smelled of sewage and cologne. Floor was dry... too dry  Noticed bright yellow still wet urine on the toilet seat. S ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ 2. You Win for the lowest water pressure ive encountered so far in the whole U.S. ...period.   The water pressure from the shower was awful! I think ive seen public water drinking fountains with better pressure. The kind you drink directly ‚Ä¶

Stopped her the night before last for a shower, we were in a hurry because we were parked on the street since this loves had no parking and we both needed a shower badly, so my wife and I shared a shower.  A very tall, large African ‚Ä¶

A regular stop for me.  Fuel, shower, food.  The place is usually pretty clean, parking is ok...as per most Loves, and the shop guys and store staff are friendly and helpful. Wish the parking lot was bigger for us heavy haul/oversize ‚Ä¶

Only one shower out of 5 available 2:45am plus only a floor mat/towel no wash cloth or towels. Very small parking lot as far from the truck stop entrance as possible. Employees need to drop the "respect me attitude" and focus on running a ‚Ä¶

6:15am 6/3/19: One of the filthiest shower rooms that I‚Äôve seen at a Loves! (see pics) New management definitely needed here.
Be careful what your body touches here. üò∑ ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Arrived here at midnight. Found multiple parkings and no wait for shower.

You can be rest assured that if you pay for a shower here the toilet seats aren't cleaned.     If there is crap on the seat they just flip it up...   out of sight out of mind is they're way of doing things

Personally I have never needed to use a shower at a gas station. Well today I had. It was actually nice, it was very clean, I was prepared for it to not have the accommodations that were needed. So, for my first time doing so I felt like it ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ dirty. The entrance and exit are not truck friendly. The parking lot was filthy. And I stupidly decided to shower here. The guy cleaning the showers was having a dance party. Blasting music so loud I couldn't think let alone hear anyone ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ on tangibles for truck drivers as though we are filthy rich. The restroom was very clean and private. I didn't check shower facilities at this location but if the showers are like the bathrooms then the place is probably just as clean.

This was the best one we have used showers at! When we decided to sale our home and become otr truckers the 1 thing I had a issue with my disability is handicap showers and every place we have been to the handheld shower has been broke, or ‚Ä¶

Very dirty store. Walked into my shower and used towels hanging on the hooks. Was my shower even cleaned? Getting coffee and the creamer/sugar station soo dirty. I guess employees doing just enough too get a paycheck...
Great shower. Actually fresh laundered towels. One of a few places that do this.

Great service, clean shower hot water!!
Thanks everyone üôÇ ‚Ä¶

Fix your shower app! My shower reserve option is still stuck on a shower from weeks ago and I can‚Äôt get anyone from customer service to pick up the phone! Shouldn‚Äôt have to wait a hour on a god damm shower

showerReviews.reviewText: Showers and laundry were a bit pricey, $17 for a shower and $6 per load of laundry. Otherwise not a bad place, it was clean and the prices on fuel were competitive. If you're just looking for a good shower I would recommend the Choctaw ‚Ä¶
Good water hole to take a shower n stock up on food ! Cheap fuel price using mudflap platform !
Excellent stop to get off the road for a minute or two, fuel, food or a shower.
Hot, clean shower. Hot pizza. Good price on diesel.
